timeline.message: Schedule: Initial update to FullCalendar v5 (#5776)
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/primefaces/primefaces into issue-5776-fullcalendarv5
implement #5776: Update FullCalendar to v5, tested against showcase

timeline.author: melloware

replies.bodyText:
I am actually using Boolean objects on purpose here, see the docs on DefaultScheduleEvent.Builder#draggable: There are actually three possible scenarios: (a) draggable = false, which makes the event not draggable,overriding the default that was set on the Schedule component globally, (b) draggable = true, which makes the event always draggable, and (c) draggable = null (the default), which uses the default that was set on the schedule component.
I added some JavaDocs to DefaultScheduleEvent.Builder#draggable, but I guess I could add docs to this method, too.
replies.author: blutorange

replies.bodyText: Cool as long as it was on purpose just mark this issue resolved.
replies.author: melloware
